product_name: 83 Sportswear Cycling Around The World Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Which part of the globe will you cycle next? Wherever you roll, wear the women's Cycling Around The World Bike Jersey from 83 Sportswear for comfort and performance. Polyester Euro-Mesh microfiber with Airdry Technology excels at wicking moisture and drying fast to keep you comfortable. Antimicrobial finish resists odors. Full-length, hidden front zipper gives you maximum venting options. Mesh side panels enhance ventilation. 3 rear pockets stash your snacks. Elastic hem helps keep the jersey in place. The 83 Sportswear Cycling Around The World Bike Jersey for women features a slightly relaxed club-cut fit and a bold graphic design.
short_description: Which part of the globe will you cycle next? Wherever you roll, wear the women's Cycling Around The World Bike Jersey from 83 Sportswear for comfort and performance.
